languages.text: "Ритуал завершен... но не ты". {n}Старец подает знак, и один из культистов подходит ближе, бережно держа в руках странное одеяние.{/n}
"The ritual is complete... but you are not." {n}The Vizsier gestures for one of the cultists, who is carefully holding a strange garment, to come closer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ритуал завершен... но не ты". {n}Старец подает знак, и один из культистов подходит ближе, бережно держа в руках странное одеяние.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The ritual is complete... but you are not." {n}The old man gestures one of the cultists, who's carefully holding a strange garment, to come closer.{/n}

languages.text: "Das Ritual ist abgeschlossen ... doch Euch fehlt noch etwas." {n}Der Wesir gibt einem Kultisten, der ein merkwürdiges Gewand in den Händen trägt, ein Zeichen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ritual is complete... but you are not." {n}The Vizsier gestures for one of the cultists, who is carefully holding a strange garment, to come closer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das Ritual ist abgeschlossen ... doch Euch fehlt noch etwas." {n}Der Wesir gibt einem Kultisten, der ein merkwürdiges Gewand in den Händen trägt, ein Zeichen.{/n}

languages.text: «El ritual está completo... pero usted no».{n}El Visir indica con un gesto a otro cultista, que lleva una extraña prenda, para que se acerque.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ritual is complete... but you are not." {n}The Vizsier gestures for one of the cultists, who is carefully holding a strange garment, to come closer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El ritual está completo... pero usted no».{n}El Visir indica con un gesto a otro cultista, que lleva una extraña prenda, para que se acerque.{/n}

languages.text: 「儀式は完了したが…あなたはまだだ」{n}ヴィジールが教団員の一人に手で指す。変わった衣装を大事そうに抱えているその人物が近づいてくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ritual is complete... but you are not." {n}The Vizsier gestures for one of the cultists, who is carefully holding a strange garment, to come closer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「儀式は完了したが…あなたはまだだ」{n}ヴィジールが教団員の一人に手で指す。変わった衣装を大事そうに抱えているその人物が近づいてくる。{/n}

languages.text: “仪式已经完成了……但您还没有。”{n}宿老向其中一名信徒打了个手势，那个人小心翼翼地拿着一件古怪的衣服，朝你靠了过来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ritual is complete... but you are not." {n}The Vizsier gestures for one of the cultists, who is carefully holding a strange garment, to come closer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “仪式已经完成了……但您还没有。”{n}宿老向其中一名信徒打了个手势，那个人小心翼翼地拿着一件古怪的衣服，朝你靠了过来。{/n}

languages.text: « Le rituel, oui... mais vous ne pouvez pas encore en dire autant. » {n}Le vizir adresse un geste à l'un des cultistes, qui tient respectueusement un étrange habit entre ses mains, et lui fait signe d'approcher.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ritual is complete... but you are not." {n}The Vizsier gestures for one of the cultists, who is carefully holding a strange garment, to come closer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le rituel, oui... mais vous ne pouvez pas encore en dire autant. » {n}Le vizir adresse un geste à l'un des cultistes, qui tient respectueusement un étrange habit entre ses mains, et lui fait signe d'approcher.{/n}

languages.text: "Ayin tamamlandı... Ancak siz henüz tam değilsiniz." {n}Vezir, tuhaf bir giysiyi dikkatle tutan tarikatçılardan birine işaret ederek yaklaşmasını belirtiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ritual is complete... but you are not." {n}The Vizsier gestures for one of the cultists, who is carefully holding a strange garment, to come closer.{/n}
